name: Slimescape (Necro Games, andruplay9, NomadziorBG, Senterri)
description:
we tried...

A / D + Spacebar(hold) - movement left-right

R - combine / split apart

Collect other pieces of you to advance in the dungeon. Be careful! There are some dangerous creatures lurking in the dark...

Team size: 4

Team: NomadziorBG, Senterri, andruplay9, Necro Games

Game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1
